definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: I know the sap that courses through the trees.
sentences.chinese: 我清楚地了解流动在树干里的树液。

sentences.english: The clogs were made in one piece of the trunks of walnut trees which formed a rectangle with its roots.
sentences.chinese: 木底鞋用一整块根部呈长方形的胡桃树的树干制成。

sentences.english: They dredged up some old toys from the bottom of the trunk.
sentences.chinese: 他们从树干底部挖出一些旧玩具。

sentences.english: Their trunks are as gnarled as bonsai.
sentences.chinese: 这些柳树的树干盘根错杂，仿佛盆景一般。

sentences.english: Swoops just in time to his remembered tree.
sentences.chinese: 恰好及时地冲回他记得的树干。

sentences.english: For a long time, I watched them scurrying around the base of the tree in bewilderment.
sentences.chinese: 我观察良久，看到它们一直围着树干底部团团转。

sentences.english: One by one, I nailed the rafters atop the stud walls while standing inside the 5 x 8–foot house, alongside the mature tree trunk.
sentences.chinese: 围绕着粗壮的树干，我把椽钉到立柱墙顶部。

sentences.english: Branches of a tree grow from the trunk.
sentences.chinese: 一棵树的枝丫长自树干。

sentences.english: The fir tree is black at the trunk, white out at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 冷杉的树干是黑色的，而树冠则披着白色。

sentences.english: The bark was riven off from the trunk.
sentences.chinese: 树皮从树干上被扯了下来。

sentences.english: You see so many copper coins growing on the trunk.
sentences.chinese: 你看这树干上长了那么多铜钱。

sentences.english: The tree looks high and strong but ___ its trunk is hollow .
sentences.chinese: 这棵树看上去又高又壮，实际上树干是空的。

sentences.english: An old tree has such a huge, hollow trunk, that it can hold many people.
sentences.chinese: 一棵老猴面包树的巨大的空心树干可以容纳许多人。

sentences.english: I eulogize the tall and straight trunk of the white poplar.
sentences.chinese: 我赞美白杨树那挺拔的树干。

sentences.english: The morning glory climbs the trunk with its tendril .
sentences.chinese: 牵牛花用卷须攀着树干。

sentences.english: Trees and bones are strong and relatively lightweight.
sentences.chinese: 树干和骨骼不仅非常强韧，而且重量相对较轻。

definition: variant of 枝椏|枝桠[zhi1 ya1]
